ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Frame_Agreement_Call_off__c = true, OR( TEXT(Frame_Agreement_SE__c)='', ISBLANK( Call_Off_Due_Date__c ), ISBLANK( Call_Off_Request_Date__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When 'Frame Agreement Call-off' is checked, Frame agreement, Call-off Due Date and Call-off Request date must all have a value
